title: Galarzaa's Blog
description: Galarzaa's personal blog about random topics like software development, technology and gaming.

items.title: My self-hosting journey
items.content_html: I have been getting a bit too involved in self-hosting. I've been doing it for years, but in the last couple of months I started structuring it more seriously and following the self-hosted community more closely.

items.title: Standalone blog
items.content_html: My blog is now on its own standalone site! It was previously under https://docs.galarzaa.com/blog, but now it gets its own place: https://blog.galarzaa.com...

items.title: My Daily Power Toys
items.content_html: PowerToys is one of those tools that has become a must-have for me in my PC. It constantly makes me wonder... why is this not just built in into Windows?

items.title: Networking Beginner vs Nintendo Switch
items.content_html: Yesterday, I had to change my home WiFi and update all the devices at home to point to the new network. It was a pretty fun experience.

items.title: blog init
items.content_html:
Hello! I have been considering writing a blog for a long time, but I always end up talking myself out of it.

  • "No one will even read it."
  • "What are you even going to write about on it?"
  • "Who even reads blogs anymore?"

Well, I believe the first step is the hardest one, so here it is!
